channel.title: Onebip. (not sure if this is correct section, tell me if its not)
channel.description: well i just got a $35 donation via onebip, is there anyway i can transfer it to my paypal?

item.title: Onebip. (not sure if this is correct section, tell me if its not)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve used them before they don’t scam in my experience, I think I had 200 USD paid out and they deducted like 100USD in costs, what a joke.

They took like 5 months to process it as well.

@chillwitm888 wrote:

pot up pls:

well i just got a $35 donation via onebip, is there anyway i can transfer it to my paypal?

I would tell you the answer but its just that I never used it
Onebip is a terrible site to receive money with, use Paypal
try spending that 35 dollars on something you want on the web
